Querys.query: CREATE TABLE customer( CustomerId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, CusName VARCHAR(75) NOT NULL, Address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Email VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, MobileNo VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PayMethod TINYINT NOT NULL, CusRef VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE grn( GRNNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, VehicleNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, ContainerNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, TrailerNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, Date DATE NOT NULL, STime VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, ETime VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, CusId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (CusId) REFERENCES customer(CustomerId) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE grn_qty( id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, GRNNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, ItemId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, Qty FLOAT NOT NULL, SeqFeet INT NOT NULL, CBM INT NOT NULL, WLocId VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, DamageQty FLOAT NOT NULL, Status VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, Remark VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (GRNNo) REFERENCES grn(GRNNo) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (ItemId) REFERENCES item(itemId) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE item( itemId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, itemName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, itemDescription VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, remark VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, paymentMethod INT NOT NULL DEFAULT -1, price FLOAT NOT NULL DEFAULT -1, uom VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'None' );

CREATE TABLE gdn( GDNNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, VehicleNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, ContainerNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, Date DATE NOT NULL, STime VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, ETime VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, CusId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (CusId) REFERENCES customer(CustomerId) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE gdn_qty( id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, GDNNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, GRNNo VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, itemId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, Qty FLOAT NOT NULL, SeqFeet INT NOT NULL, CBM INT NOT NULL, Remark VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (GDNNo) REFERENCES gdn(GDNNo) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (GRNNo) REFERENCES grn(GRNNo) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (itemId) REFERENCES item(itemId) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

CREATE TABLE item_delete_req( id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, itemId VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, reason VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (itemId) REFERENCES item(itemId) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE )
